message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations, offering unparalleled quality and functionality. We believe its true value surpasses $1000000, but we are willing to start our negotiation at $850000. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship of your product. However, my budget is quite limited, and I am looking for a price closer to $1000000. I'm willing to consider a price between $1000000 and $1500000 depending on the specifics of the deal. Could we perhaps find a middle ground?
